DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine multiple dose safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics ABT-333 nonfasting condition healthy adult subject , determine effect single dose administration ketoconazole steady state ABT-333 pharmacokinetics
DOC.brief_title: A Study Healthy Adult Subjects Evaluate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Multiple Doses ABT-333
DOC.detailed_description: Phase 1 , Blinded , Randomized , Placebo-controlled Study Healthy Adult Subjects Evaluate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetic Profiles Multiple Doses ABT-333
DOC.criteria: Main Selection Criteria Healthy Volunteers : Subject provide write consent . Subject general good health . If female , subject postmenopausal least 2 year surgically sterile . If female , subject pregnant breastfeeding . Male female 18 55 year old , inclusive . If male , subject must surgically sterile practice least 1 method birth control . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 29 , inclusive . See main selection criterion
